Hidden at the edge of the woods, when Alphonsine goes by, Sosthène rolls through the grass until he lands at the beauty's feet, proclaiming his love in a deranged voice: \"Be mine, or die!\", \"You idiot!\". Blood rushes to Sosthène's head.
